TEXT.English: Historical
TEXT.Chinese: 历史

TEXT.English: Historical Victory goals
TEXT.Chinese: 历史胜利目标

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]

TEXT.English: Goal accomplished!
TEXT.Chinese: 目标完成!

TEXT.English: Goal Failed!
TEXT.Chinese: 目标失败!

TEXT.English: YES
TEXT.Chinese: 已完成

TEXT.English: NO
TEXT.Chinese: 失败

TEXT.English: Not yet
TEXT.Chinese: 尚未

TEXT.English: We have accomplished 2 Historical Goals out of 3. A Triumphal Arch has been built in our capital
TEXT.Chinese: 我们完成了3个历史目标中的2个。一座凯旋门在我们首都落成。

TEXT.English: Some of our rivals envy our accomplishments, and they are ganging up on us!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的一些竞争对手嫉妒我们的成就,现在他们联合起来对付我们!

TEXT.English: Historical goals accomplished:
TEXT.Chinese: 已完成历史目标:

TEXT.English: Rejoice! The %s1 goal of your Historical Victory has been accomplished!
TEXT.Chinese: 恭喜! 你的历史任务 %s1 已经完成了!

TEXT.English: Unfortunately you have failed the %s1 goal of your Historical Victory!
TEXT.Chinese: 很不幸，你的历史任务 %s1 失败了!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Is automatically built in your capital when you achieve 2 out of your 3 Historical Goals[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]自动建立在你的首都当你完成3个历史目标中的2个[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Second Rome:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Constantinople the largest and most cultured city in 1025AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]第二罗马:[COLOR_REVERT]1025年时使君士坦丁堡成为人口最多文化最高的城市。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reliving the Roman Glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Balkans and Anatolia in 1282AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]重现罗马的荣耀:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1282AD控制巴尔干半岛和安那托利亚.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Crossroads of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the richest empire in the world in 1453AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]世界的十字路口:[COLOR_REVERT]1453年时成为世界上最富有的帝国。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Bulgaria on Three Seas:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Moesia, Thrace, Macedonia, Serbia, Arberia, Thessaloniki and Constantinople by 917AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]君临三海的保加利亚:[COLOR_REVERT]917年前征服默西亚,色雷斯,马其顿,塞尔维亚,阿尔巴尼亚,塞萨洛尼基和君士坦丁堡。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Beginning of the Renaissance:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumulate at least 100 Orthodox Faith Points by 1259AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]文艺复兴的开始:[COLOR_REVERT] 1259 年前积累至少100点东正教信仰点数.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Not Even the Birds Can Fly Through:[COLOR_REVERT] Do not lose a city to barbarians (Mongols), Byzantines, or Ottomans before 1396AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]一只鸟也不能飞过:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1396年前不丢失任何一座给野蛮人(蒙古人),拜占庭,奥斯曼.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the West:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Ile-De-France, Normandy, Picardy, Aquitania, Provence, Burgundy, Orleans, Champagne, Lorraine, Catalonia, Lombardy, Tuscany, Swabia and Saxony by 840AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]西方帝国:[COLOR_REVERT]在840年征服法兰西岛,诺曼底,皮卡第,阿基坦,普罗旺斯,勃艮第,奥尔良,香槟,洛林,加泰罗尼亚,伦巴第,托斯卡纳,斯瓦比亚和萨克森.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the Holy Land:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Jerusalem in 1291AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]帝国圣地:[COLOR_REVERT]1291年时控制耶路撒冷。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Empire of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 5 Colonies.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]世界帝国:[COLOR_REVERT] 建立5个殖民地.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Burgundian Way of Life:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 10,000 culture points by 1336AD. (Great Artists don't count)
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]勃艮第人的生活方式:[COLOR_REVERT]1336年前积累10000点文化（大艺术家不计入）。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Reunification:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Burgundy, Provence, Picardy, Flanders, Champagne and Lorraine in 1376AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]重新统一:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1376年控制勃艮第, 普罗旺斯, 皮卡第, 佛兰德斯, 香槟和洛林.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Western Power:[COLOR_REVERT] Have a higher score than France, England and Germany in 1473AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]西方力量:[COLOR_REVERT] 1473 年时积分超过法国英国和德国.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Sword of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Levant and Egypt in 955AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]伊斯兰之剑:[COLOR_REVERT] 在955控制黎凡特埃及.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The House of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the Levant, Egypt and Northern Africa in 1291AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]伊斯兰家园:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1291年控制黎凡特, 埃及和北非.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The World of Islam:[COLOR_REVERT] Spread Islam to at least 35% of the population of Europe.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]伊斯兰世界:[COLOR_REVERT] 将伊斯兰教传播至欧洲人口的至少35％.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewel of the World:[COLOR_REVERT] Make Cordoba the largest city in the world in 961AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]世界之珠:[COLOR_REVERT]961年时使科尔多瓦成为世界上最大的城市。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Superior Moorish Architecture:[COLOR_REVERT] Build the Alhambra, the Gardens of Al-Andalus, and La Mezquita by 1309AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]高级摩尔式建筑:[COLOR_REVERT]1309年前建造阿罕布拉宫,赫内拉利费花园和科尔多瓦主教座堂。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ummah of Iberia:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure Islam is present in every city in the Iberian peninsula in 1492AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]伊比利亚共同体:[COLOR_REVERT] 1492 年确保伊斯兰教存在于伊比利亚半岛上的任意一个城市.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reconquista:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure Catholicism is the only religion present in every city in the Iberian peninsula in 1492AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]收复失地运动:[COLOR_REVERT] 1492 年时确保天主教是伊比利亚半岛上的所有城市的唯一宗教.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Spanish Armada:[COLOR_REVERT] Have more Colonies than any other nation in 1588AD (while having at least 3).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]西班牙无敌舰队:[COLOR_REVERT] 1588年时殖民地数量比所有国家都多(至少三个).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Catholic Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Ensure that the Catholic nations have more population and more land than any other religion in 1648AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]欧洲天主教的守卫者:[COLOR_REVERT]1648年时确保天主教国家拥有的人口和土地超过任何其他宗教。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Adriatic Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Verona, Dalmatia, Arberia and Epirus by 1004AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]亚得里亚海的支配者:[COLOR_REVERT]1004年前征服维罗纳,达尔马提亚,阿尔巴尼亚和伊庇鲁斯。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the Mediterranean Sea:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Constantinople, Thessaly, Morea, Crete and Cyprus by 1204AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]主宰地中海:[COLOR_REVERT] 1204 年前征服君士坦丁堡,色萨利,摩里亚,克里特和塞浦路斯.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Domination of the World Ocean:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the first to build a Colony from the Age of Discovery (Vinland is from the Viking Age).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]支配全球海洋:[COLOR_REVERT] 成为发现时代第一个建立殖民地的国家 (文兰是属于维京时代).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lavra:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 2 Orthodox cathedrals and 8 Orthodox monasteries by 1250AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]劳拉:[COLOR_REVERT]1250年前建造2个东正教大教堂和8个东正教修道院。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominance of the Rus':[COLOR_REVERT] Control 10 provinces out of Kiev, Podolia, Pereyaslavl, Sloboda, Chernigov, Volhynia, Minsk, Polotsk, Smolensk, Moscow, Murom, Rostov, Novgorod and Vologda in 1288AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]俄罗斯主宰:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1288年控制以下省份中的10个基辅,波多里亚,波里亚斯拉弗尔,斯洛博达,切尔尼戈夫,沃里尼亚,明斯克,波洛茨克,斯摩棱斯克,莫斯科,穆罗姆,罗斯托夫,诺夫哥罗德和沃洛格达.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Fertile Black Soil:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce 25000 food by 1300AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]肥沃黑土:[COLOR_REVERT] 1300年前生产25000食物.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Paganism:[COLOR_REVERT] Accumulate 2000 Culture points without declaring a state religion before 1386AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]多神信仰:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1368年前在无国教下积累2000点文化.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lithuanian Commonwealth:[COLOR_REVERT] Have at least 18 cities in 1569AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]波兰立陶宛联邦:[COLOR_REVERT]1569年时至少拥有18个城市。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Domination of Eastern Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer the province of Moscow or vassalize Muscovy.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]东欧主宰:[COLOR_REVERT] 征服莫斯科省份或者附庸莫斯科.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Allow no Ottoman cities in mainland Europe in 1444AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]欧洲守卫:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1444年时,欧洲大陆不允许有任何奥斯曼帝国城市.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Black Army:[COLOR_REVERT] Control the most territory in Europe in 1490AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]黑军:[COLOR_REVERT]1490年时成为欧洲拥有最多领土的国家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Edict of Torda:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the first to adopt Religious Tolerance.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]多尔达诏令:[COLOR_REVERT]第一个采用宗教宽容.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Holy Roman Empire:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Lorraine, Swabia, Saxony, Bavaria, Franconia, Brandenburg, Holstein, Lombardy and Tuscany in 1167AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]神圣罗马帝国:[COLOR_REVERT]1167年时控制洛林,斯瓦比亚,萨克森,巴伐利亚,弗兰肯尼亚,勃兰登堡,荷尔斯泰因,伦巴第和托斯卡纳.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Reformation:[COLOR_REVERT] Found Protestantism.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]宗教改革:[COLOR_REVERT]创立新教。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Thirty Years' War:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Swabia, Saxony, Bavaria, Franconia, Brandenburg, Holstein, Flanders, Pomerania, Silesia, Bohemia, Moravia and Austria in 1648AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]30十年战争:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1648年控制斯瓦比亚,萨克森,巴伐利亚,法兰克尼亚,勃兰登堡,荷尔施泰因,佛兰德斯,波美拉尼亚,西里西亚,波希米亚,摩拉维亚和奥地利.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Granary of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Produce the most food at least one year between 1500AD and 1520AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]欧洲粮仓:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1500-1520之间至少有一年生产最多食物.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Commonwealth:[COLOR_REVERT] Own at least 12 cities in Bohemia, Moravia, Upper Hungary, Prussia, Lithuania, Livonia, Polotsk, Minsk, Volhynia, Podolia, Moldova and Kiev provinces in 1600AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]大联邦:[COLOR_REVERT] 1600 年时拥有波斯尼亚,摩拉维亚,上匈牙利,普鲁士,立陶宛,利沃尼亚,波洛茨克,明斯克,荷兰,波多利亚,摩尔多瓦和基辅等省份至少12个城市.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Golden Liberty:[COLOR_REVERT] Construct 3 Catholic and Orthodox Cathedrals, 2 Protestant Cathedrals, and have at least 2 Jewish Quarters in your cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]黄金自由:[COLOR_REVERT]建造三座天主教,东正教和新教教堂,并在你的城市至少有两个犹太区。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Homeland:[COLOR_REVERT] Make sure there are no Mongol (Barbarian) cities in Russia and Ukraine in 1482AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]家园:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1482年确保俄罗斯和乌克兰没有蒙古人(野蛮人)城市.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Endless Land:[COLOR_REVERT] Control at least 20% of Europe.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]无尽的土地:[COLOR_REVERT] 控制欧洲20%的土地.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Warm Seas:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Constantinople or control an Atlantic Access resource.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]温暖的海洋:[COLOR_REVERT] 征服君士坦丁堡或控制大西洋航线资源.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Respublica Superiorem Non Recognoscens:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Corsica, Sardinia, Crete, Rhodes and Crimea in 1566AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]最尊贵的热那亚共和国:[COLOR_REVERT]在1566年控制科西嘉,撒丁,克里特,罗兹和克里米亚。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Bank of Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 8 Banks in your cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]欧洲银行:[COLOR_REVERT] 在你的城市建立8间银行s.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Trade above everything else:[COLOR_REVERT] Have the largest total amount of commerce from foreign Trade Route Exports and Imports in 1640AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]贸易高于一切:[COLOR_REVERT] 1640年时对外贸易路线的出口和进口贸易总量最大.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Crown:[COLOR_REVERT] Control London, Wessex, East Anglia, Mercia, Northumbria, Scotland, Wales, Ireland, Normandy, Picardy, Bretagne, Il-de-France, Aquitania and Orleans in 1452AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]大英王权:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1452年控制伦敦,韦塞克斯,东英吉利亚,麦西亚,诺森布里亚, 苏格兰,威尔士,爱尔兰, 诺曼底,皮卡第,布列塔尼,法兰西岛,阿基坦和奥尔良.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Jewel of the Crown:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 7 Colonies.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]王冠宝石:[COLOR_REVERT] 建立七个殖民地.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Inventors of the Crown:[COLOR_REVERT] Be the first to enter the Industrial age.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]发明之冠:[COLOR_REVERT]第一个进入工业时代。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Navigators:[COLOR_REVERT] Settle 3 cities on the Azores, Canaries and Madeira and 2 in Morocco, Tetouan and Oran.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]航海家:[COLOR_REVERT]安置三座城市在亚速尔,加纳利和马德拉,两座城市在得土安与奥兰。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defense leads to glory:[COLOR_REVERT] Do not lose a city before 1640AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]守往荣耀:[COLOR_REVERT]1640年前不丢失任何城市。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Feitorias all over the world:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 5 Colonies.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]五洲四海:[COLOR_REVERT] 建立五个殖民地.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Habsburg Empire:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Hungary, Upper Hungary, Austria, Bavaria, Carinthia, Transylvania, Pannonia, Moravia, Silesia and Bohemia in 1617AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]哈布斯堡帝国:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1617年控制匈牙利,上匈牙利,奥地利,巴伐利亚,卡林西亚,特兰西瓦尼亚,潘诺尼亚, 摩拉维亚,西里西亚和波希米亚.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Habsburg Alliances:[COLOR_REVERT] Have 3 vassals in 1700AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]哈布斯堡同盟:[COLOR_REVERT]1700年时收纳3个附庸国。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Habsburg Domination:[COLOR_REVERT] Have the highest score in 1780AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]哈布斯堡王朝:[COLOR_REVERT]1780年时积分最高。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Osman's Empire:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Constantinople and the Balkans in 1453AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]奥斯曼帝国:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1453年控制君士坦丁堡省份和巴尔干半岛地区.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Osman's Dream:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Anatolia, the Levant and Egypt in 1517AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]奥斯曼之梦:[COLOR_REVERT] 1517年时控制安纳托利亚,黎凡特和埃及.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Victory over Europe:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer Austria by 1683AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]战胜欧洲:[COLOR_REVERT]1683年前征服奥地利。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Financial Center:[COLOR_REVERT] Settle 5 Great Merchants in Amsterdam by 1750AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]金融中心:[COLOR_REVERT]1750年前在阿姆斯特丹进驻5位大商业家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The India Companies:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 3 Colonies and complete both Trading Companies.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]东印度公司:[COLOR_REVERT] 建立3个殖民地并完成两个贸易公司.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Financial Domination:[COLOR_REVERT] Become the richest country in Europe.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]金融霸主:[COLOR_REVERT]成为欧洲最富有的国家。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Eastern Lands:[COLOR_REVERT] Have six cities in Norrland, easterland and Karelia in 1323AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]东方之地:[COLOR_REVERT] 1323年时在诺尔兰,东境和卡累利阿拥有六座城市.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Lion of the North:[COLOR_REVERT] Raze 5 Catholic cities while being Protestant by 1660AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]北欧雄狮:[COLOR_REVERT] 1660 前摧毁5座天主教城市同时皈依新教.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Dominium Maris Baltici:[COLOR_REVERT] Control every coastal city on the Baltic in 1750AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]波罗的海-多米尼加[COLOR_REVERT] 1750年时控制波罗的海所有海边城市.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Vikings:[COLOR_REVERT] Gain 100 Viking points and build Vinland by 1066AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]维京人:[COLOR_REVERT] 1066年前获得100个维京点数并建立文兰殖民地.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Conquerors:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer The Isles, Ireland, Scotland, Normandy, Sicily, Apulia, Calabria and Iceland by 1194AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]征服者:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1194年前征服群岛,爱尔兰,苏格兰,诺曼底, 西西里岛,阿普利亚, 卡拉布里亚和冰岛.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Statesmen:[COLOR_REVERT] Have a higher score than Sweden, Denmark, Scotland, England, Germany and France in 1320AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]政治家:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1320年时积分超过瑞典,丹麦,苏格兰,英格兰,德国和法国.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]North Sea Empire:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Denmark, Skaneland, Gtaland, Svealand, Mercia, London, Northumbria and East Anglia in 1050AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]北海帝国:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1050年时控制丹麦,斯科讷,约塔兰,斯韦阿兰,麦西亚,伦敦,诺森布里亚,东英吉利亚.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Kalmar Union:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Denmark, Norway, Vestfold, Skaneland, Gtaland, Svealand, Norrland, Gotland, easterland, Estonia and Iceland in 1523AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]卡尔玛联盟:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1523年时控制丹麦,挪威,西福尔,斯科讷,约塔兰,斯韦阿兰,诺尔兰,哥特兰,东境,爱沙尼亚和冰岛.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ostindisk Kompagni:[COLOR_REVERT] Build 3 Colonies and complete both Trading Companies.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]东印度公司:[COLOR_REVERT] 建立3个殖民地,完成两家贸易公司.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Defender of Rus':[COLOR_REVERT] Control Novgorod, Karelia, Estonia and Livonia in 1284AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]俄罗斯守卫者:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1284年时控制诺夫哥罗德,卡累利阿,爱沙尼亚和利沃尼亚.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Fur Trade:[COLOR_REVERT] Control eleven sources of fur by 1397AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]毛皮贸易:[COLOR_REVERT] 1397年前控制11个毛皮资源 .

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Great Hinterlands:[COLOR_REVERT] Have seven cities in Karelia and Vologda in 1478AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]辉煌内陆:[COLOR_REVERT] 1478年时在卡累利阿和沃格格达拥有7座城市.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Northern Crusades:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Prussia, Suvalkija, Lithuania, Livonia, Estonia, and Pomerania in 1410AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]北方十字军:[COLOR_REVERT] 1410年时控制普鲁士,苏瓦基亚,立陶宛,利沃尼亚,爱沙尼亚和波美拉尼亚.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Seven Years' War:[COLOR_REVERT] Conquer two cities from each of Austria, Muscowy, Germany, Sweden, France and Spain between 1650AD and 1763AD, if they are still alive.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]七年战争:[COLOR_REVERT] 1650年到1763年间攻克奥地利,莫斯科,德国,瑞典,法国和西班牙各两座城市(如果对方已经灭亡则不计算).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Enlightened Despotism:[COLOR_REVERT] Settle a total of 15 Great People in any combination, including Great Generals, in your capital.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]开明专制:[COLOR_REVERT] 在首都定居15个伟人(包括大军事家).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Fortification:[COLOR_REVERT] Have 10 Forts and 4 Castles by 1296AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]要塞艺术:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1296年前完成10座城墙和4座城堡.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Auld Alliance:[COLOR_REVERT] Have 1500 Attitude points with France by 1560AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]深情厚谊:[COLOR_REVERT] 1560年前对法国有1500态度点数.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Celtic Union:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Scotland, the Isles, Ireland, Wales and Bretagne in 1700AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]凯尔特联盟:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1700年时控制苏格兰,群岛,爱尔兰,威尔士和布列塔尼.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Sicilian Vespers:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Catalonia, Valencia, Balears and Sicily in 1282AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]西西里晚祷:[COLOR_REVERT] 1282年时控制加泰罗尼亚,瓦伦西亚,巴利阿里和西西里岛.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Thalassocracy:[COLOR_REVERT] Have 12 Consulates of the Sea in 1444AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]制海权:[COLOR_REVERT] 1444年拥有12海事法庭.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Realms of the Crown:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Catalonia, Valencia, Aragon, Balears, Corsica, Sardinia, Sicily, Calabria, Apulia, Provence and Thessaly in 1474AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]王权领地:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1474年时控制加泰罗尼亚,瓦伦西亚,阿拉贡,巴利阿里,科西嘉,撒丁岛,西西里,卡拉布里亚,阿普利亚,普罗旺斯,色萨利.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Almohads:[COLOR_REVERT] Control Morocco, Marrakesh, Fez, Tetouan, Oran, Algiers, Ifriqiya, Andalusia, Valencia and the Balearic Islands in 1227AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]穆瓦希德王朝:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1227年时控制摩洛哥,马拉喀什,菲斯,得土安,奥兰,阿尔及尔,突尼斯,安达卢西亚,瓦伦西亚和巴利阿里群岛.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Marinids:[COLOR_REVERT] Have three cities with 5000 culture each in 1465AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]马林王朝:[COLOR_REVERT] 在1465年时有3座拥有5000文化或以上的城市.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]The Saadis:[COLOR_REVERT] Destroy or vassalize Portugal, Spain, and Aragon by 1578AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW萨瓦德王朝:[COLOR_REVERT] 1578年前摧毁或者附庸葡萄牙,西班牙,阿拉贡.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Smite the infidels[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]打击异教徒[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Ensure Jerusalem is Catholic[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]确保耶路撒冷是天主教[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_YELLOW]Prophet of the World[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_YELLOW]世界先知[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: You gain points from conquering cities (+1pt per population), pillaging improvements (+1pt) and sinking ships (+2pt).
TEXT.Chinese: 征服城市 (每人口+1), 劫掠设施获得点数 (+1) 和海军胜利 (+2).

TEXT.English: You get points per turn for good relations (between -2 and 2), open borders (1), defensive pact (2), imports (1/3 per resource), exports (1/3 per resource), common wars (2 per war)
TEXT.Chinese: 每回合良好关系 (在-2和2之间),开放边界 (1),防御协定(2),进口资源(1/3每个资源),出口(1/3每个资源),共同作战(2每场战争)

TEXT.Chinese: 控制
